title: Playing top lane is completely pointless when these fucks just take teleport/smite every game
body: You have zero effect on the game because no matter how fed you get you are unable to leave your lane or else they push down all your towers, they bring more global presence to their team regardless of how many deaths they have because teleport AND super objective control, and because of red smite they can sit there and defend their towers indefinitely. 0/6 Shyvanna should not be more useful than 3/0/3 Renekton at 15 minutes into the fucking game. This balancing is a fucking joke.
